title: Azuki Bean Ice Cream
directions: The day before making the ice cream, make sure your freezer bowl for the ice cream machine is placed into the freezer. Mix all of the ingredients into a 1 L. pitcher. Store in the refrigerator overnight to chill.
ingredients: Use cannned prepared sweetened red beans
1 can (~16.75 oz.) sweetened whole red bean (Tsubu-an)
